Description: Grants +5 to max HP.
Grants Str+2.
Grants Mag+2.
Grants Skill+2.
Grants Spd+2.
Grants Lck+4.
Grants Def+2.
Grants Res+2.
Grants Mov+1.

After combat, reduces all of enemy's stats
by 4 (recovers 1/turn).

After combat, reduces enemy Str
by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

After combat, reduces enemy Mag
by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

After combat, reduces enemy Spd
by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

After combat, reduces enemy Def
by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

After combat, reduces enemy Res
by 6 (recovers 1/turn).

Use "Rally" to grant Str+4 to units
within two spaces for one turn.

Use "Rally" to grant Mag+4 to units
within two spaces for one turn.

Use "Rally" to grant Skill+4 to units
within two spaces for one turn.

Use "Rally" to grant Spd+4 to units
within two spaces for one turn.

Use "Rally" to grant Lck+8 to units
within two spaces for one turn.

Use "Rally" to grant Def+4 to units
within two spaces for one turn.

Use "Rally" to grant Res+4 to units
within two spaces for one turn.

Use "Rally" to grant Mov+1 to units
within two spaces for one turn.

Use "Sing" to grant an ally
Skill/Spd/Lck+3 for one turn.

Fell an enemy in one hit (the hit must do
damage). Trigger % = (Skill stat * 0.25)

Use Sol and Luna in succession when
attacking. Trigger % = (Skill stat * 0.5)

Strike five times at half damage.
Trigger % = (Skill stat * 0.5)

Inflicts half of attack power as extra
damage. Trigger % = (Skill stat * 0.75)

Absorb HP equal to half of damage
dealt. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

Ignore half of enemy Def/Res when
attacking. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

Add half foe's Str/Mag to unit's respective
stat. Trigger % = (Skill stat * 1.5)

Add half accrued damage to attacks.
Trigger % = (Skill stat * 1.5)

Halve sword/lance/axe/beaststone/fist/saw
damage. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

Halve bow/tome/dragonstone/breath/rock/
shuriken damage. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

Halve damage when adjacent ally is
attacked. Trigger % = (target's Lck)

If HP > 1, survive a lethal attack with 1 HP
remaining. Trigger % = (Lck stat * 1.5)

Damage taken from an adjacent attacking
enemy is also dealt back to that foe.

Magic damage taken from an attacking
enemy is also dealt back to that foe.

At start of combat, if HP=50% or less,
always strike first, even when attacked.

Enables unit in animal form to deal bonus
damage to beasts.

Enables unit to deal bonus damage to
mechanists, automatons, and stoneborn.

This unit can use a supporting unit's
triggered skills in combat.

Increases the trigger rate of this unit's
skills by 10%.

Grants use of the Shelter command.
Use to pull another player unit into cover.

Grants use of the Shove command. Use to
push an adjacent ally away one space.

Grants use of Lunge command. After
attacking, switches position with target.

Grants use of Swap command. Use to
switch spaces with an adjacent ally.

Grants use of Replicate command.
Use once per battle to create a replica.

This unit deals +4 damage when
initiating combat.

This unit deals +3 damage when
counterattacking.

This unit deals +3 damage when fighting
in a space with no terrain effects.

This unit takes -3 damage when fighting
in a space with a terrain effect.

This unit deals +4 damage on
even-numbered turns.

This unit deals +4 damage on
odd-numbered turns.

During combat, +10 to damage
dealt and taken.

When attacking, unit expends a held gold
bar for +10/-10 to damage dealt/taken.

Grants Avo+30 when the unit initiates
combat.

Increases chance of follow-up attack when
this unit initiates an attack (+5 off. Spd).

Grants Crit+20 when the unit initiates an
attack.

Grants Hit+40 when the unit initiates an
attack.

Unit receives -10 physical damage
when the unit initiates an attack.

Unit receives -20 magical damage
when the unit initiates an attack.
+5 damage dealt to nonmounted enemies.

Neither this unit nor enemies in combat
with him/her can use follow-up attacks.

+5 damage dealt if using a
sword/katana.

+5 damage dealt if using a
lance/naginata.

+5 damage dealt if using an
axe/club.

+5 damage dealt if using a
shuriken/dagger.

+5 damage dealt if using a
bow/yumi.

+5 damage dealt if using a
tome/scroll.

Grants +1 to all stats when paired up as
the lead unit.

Allies within two spaces inflict +2
damage in combat.

Female allies within two spaces receive
-2 damage in combat.

Male allies within two spaces receive
-2 damage in combat.

Allies within two spaces get +2 to damage
dealt and -2 to damage received.

Enemies within two spaces take +2 damage
when hit by a magic attack.

Enemies within two spaces inflict -2
damage with their physical attacks.

Vallite Army units within two spaces
take -2/+2 to damage dealt/taken.

Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy
is using a sword/katana.

Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy
is using a lance/naginata.

Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy
is using an axe/club.

Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy
is using a shuriken/dagger.

Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy
is using a bow/yumi.

Grants Hit/Avo+50 if the enemy
is using a tome/scroll.

Causes Hit-10, but
grants Crit+10.

Hit/Avo+15 if a foe's level is higher.
(For adv. classes, add +20 to level.)

Grants Hit/Avo+20 for
the first seven turns.

Grants Hit/Avo+30 when
battling flying enemies.
Adjacent enemies suffer -20 Avo.

Grants Hit+30 and +15% to skill-trigger
rate to this unit and enemy in combat.

Restores up to 20% HP at the start of
each turn. Trigger % = (Lck stat * 33)

Restores up to 20% HP each turn if
no units are within two spaces.

Restores up to 10% HP each turn
if an ally is within two spaces.

Restores up to 30% HP
at the start of each turn.

Restores up to 40% HP at the start of
even-numbered turns.

Restores up to 40% HP at the start of
odd-numbered turns.

Restores up to 20% HP of allies within
two spaces at the start of each turn.

Restores up to 50% HP if this unit initiates
an attack and defeats the enemy.

Makes most HP-recovery and stat-
boosting items 150% as potent.

When healing an ally with a staff, this unit
recovers the same amount of HP.

Enemies lose up to 20% HP after any
combat this unit initiates.

Foes within two spaces lose up to 20% HP
after any combat this unit initiates.

Enemies lose up to 20% HP after any
combat with this unit.

Receive Iron weapon when attacking and
defeating foe. Trigger % = (Lck stat * 2)

Get a gold bar on each of unit's first
7 turns. Trigger % = (Lck stat * 1.5)
Grants this unit a 20% bonus to EXP.

Double EXP if the unit attacks and defeats
an enemy. Trigger % = (Lck stat * 3)

Adds 10% to each stat's odds of
increasing at level up.

Can take another action after using a
recovery item or tonic.

If this unit initiates an unsupported attack
and defeats the foe, take another turn.

Allows the unit to pass through
spaces occupied by enemies.

Allows the unit to open doors
and chests without keys.

Halve magical  damage.
Trigger % = (Skill stat)

Halves damage taken, crits, and off. skills.
Prevents lethal, poison, and counter skills.

Halves damage taken. Prevents lethal,
poison, and counter skills.
Grants Hit/Avo+10.

Grants Hit/Avo+20 for
the first seven million turns.

Halves stat-reduction effects, poison
damage, and the Hit of status staves.

Prevents poison damage and status
effects on this unit.

When paired, this unit's partner fights as
if backing up instead of being in cover.

Alters the range of bows to enable
this unit to hit closer targets.

Protects from bonus damage against fliers.
Also enables unit to benefit from terrain.
Enemies earn no EXP from this unit.

If HP < 50%, self-destruct and damage
enemies and barriers within two spaces.

Unit can activate staves without expending
a use. Sets minimum staff range at 1-10.

When this unit hits, target's Mov is
reduced to 0 and Avo by -20 for one turn.

Status effects inflicted by unit
on enemies will accumulate.

This unit receives -4 magic damage on
even-numbered turns.

This unit receives -4 magic damage when
an enemy initiates the attack.

This unit recovers from status effects at
twice the normal rate.

This unit deals +7 damage when he or she
initiates the attack.

When this unit is backing up another
attacker, inflicts +3 damage to enemy.

Grants +30 to Hit/Avo/Crit/Ddg when
HP is half or less.

Grants Hit+10 to attacking ally when
this unit is supporting.

Grants Crit/Ddg+10 to adjacent allies
in combat.

Add half Mag or Str to the other value
when attacking. Trigger % = (Skill stat)

Use "Rally" to grant +2 to all stats to
allies within four spaces for one turn.
Doubles the EXP this unit receives.

Protects from bonus damage
against armor.

Protects from bonus damage
against beasts.

Enables non-dark mages to use
dark magic. At start of each turn,
unit recovers from Hex, halved Str/
Mag status, and halves reductions
to unit's Mag. If unit carries Nos,
instantly cleanses those statuses.

Str+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked
(+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

Mag+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked
(+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

Skill+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked
(+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

Spd+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked
(+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

Lck+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked
(+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

Def+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked
(+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

Res+2 on defeat of a foe you attacked
(+10 max). Can't use with other Takers.

Unit can activate staves without expending
a use.

Unit does not suffer stat
penalties from their weapon.

At the start of each turn, grants +2 to
all stats to adjacent allies for one turn.

Grants +4 Str/Mag/Skl/Spd when
HP is half or less.

Obtain medicine on each of unit's first
first 7 turns. Trigger % = (Lck stat * 2)

Use "Warp" to move next to an ally and
then take another action.

Foes this unit attacks get Move 0, Avo-20
for 1 turn. Trigger % = (Skill stat * 1.5)

This light-footed fighting style grants
Spd+3 but Def-1.

When paired up and in cover, grants
additional Dual Guard points.

This unsubtle fighting style grants Str+3
but Spd-1.
Grants Ddg+15 during battle.
